channel.title: Help With NPC attack PLEASE
channel.description: Yes so i was editing some stuff and accedintally clicked apply to all... and now my npc's will hit like 21 32 21 16 17 in the amount of like two seconds instead of the normal time... does anyone know how to change it back? if so it would be a huge help!!

item.title: Help With NPC attack PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

/** * Attack delays **/ public int getNpcDelay(int i) { switch(npcs[i].npcType) { case 2025: case 2028: return 7;

That’s where it resolves the return you sent into a attack delay, meaning how often.
the ‘return 7;’ would mean the npcs 2025,2028 would hit every 7 seconds i believe?

NPCHandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Help With NPC attack PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you didn’t close it, you can do ctrl+z.
